fields.description: This is an umbrella issue for a variety of follow-up Jiras to refactor and improve the array kernels / function machinery to have less overhead and work more efficiently for parallel processing as well as small inputs (down to ~1000 elements per kernel invocation)
fields.summary: [C++] Improve array expression and kernel evaluation performance on small inputs
